title: Incompatible issues?

embed.description: Hello riot, I've Jst received the email and joined the beta however when I try to download the app it told me my device is incompatible. I use a Samsung Galaxy s4 which runs lollipop 5.0.1. Is this an issue with the app or I Jst can't use it

body:
Hi Rito staffers~

iMade a former post before about the incompatible issues ... Is there an update on that ? I'm I completely out of luck ?

-Thank in advance

replies.body:
Heya! So we did find and test on a similar device recently and it seems to be working on our end.  Have you tried installing the non-beta version? 

Here's the link for that: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.riotgames.mobile.leagueconnect&referrer=utm_source%3D42matters.com%26utm_medium%3DWidgetWeb

Thanks That Worked! Ima win my next game in the name of Sparkle~

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
